CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 16, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "'King And Queen Of Coppertown' - William Corbin was crowned 'King of Coppertown' and Ann Turner was named queen in recent coronation ball given to close the festivities of the Beauty Shop Owners' three-day annual meet here. The King and Queen were winners of the popularity contest sponsored by the Shop Owners in connection with their conference held Nov. 3 to 5.  Shown presenting 'Queen' Turner with her award is Mrs. Mildred Brown, general chairman of the conference committee.  The coronation culminated three full days of business sessions, interesting speeches, a public meeting at which mayor David Lawrence appeared, and many other social events. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: "Queen" Ann Turner and "King" William Corbin, holding hand of woman wearing dark dress with light colored cowl and sleeves, during coronation ball given to close festivities of the Beauty Shop Owners annual convention
